name: Celestial
text: Choose a creature. Until the end of your next turn, whenever that creature deals damage to a player, it deals that much damage to the other player instead.

name: Ethereal
text: Choose a creature. Until the end of your next turn, whenever that creature deals damage to a player, it deals that much damage to the other player instead.

text: Choose a creature. Until the end of your next turn, whenever that creature deals damage to a player, it deals that much damage to the other player instead.
